🎓 Welcome to My Academic Portfolio

Exploring Economics through Data Science and Analytical Excellence

This portfolio showcases three years of rigorous academic work in Economics at UiT - The Arctic University of Norway, demonstrating proficiency in quantitative analysis, programming, and economic research.

📚 Academic Journey

Year 1: Foundation Building

Fundamental Economics & Quantitative Skills

Course Focus Area Key Skills
SOK-1003 Microeconomics Market analysis, consumer theory
SOK-1004 Macroeconomics National accounts, fiscal policy
SOK-1005 Data Science R programming, statistical analysis
SOK-1006 Statistics Hypothesis testing, regression
SOK-1016 Mathematics Calculus, optimization

Year 2: Advanced Theory & Application

Specialized Knowledge & Practical Skills

Course Focus Area Key Skills
SOK-2008 Advanced Micro Game theory, market failures
SOK-2009 Advanced Macro Growth models, monetary policy
SOK-2011 Environmental Econ Sustainability, climate economics
SOK-2012 Business Economics Strategic management, finance
SOK-2030 Applied Economics Policy analysis, econometrics

Year 3: Specialization & Research

Independent Research & Advanced Analytics

Course Focus Area Key Skills
SOK-2013 Econometrics Advanced statistical methods
SOK-2014 Economic Analysis Research methodology
SOK-2209 Bachelor Thesis Independent research project

💻 Technical Proficiency

Programming & Analysis

  • R: Advanced data manipulation, statistical modeling, visualization
  • Python: Data science libraries, machine learning applications
  • Quarto: Professional document creation and web publishing
  • LaTeX: Academic writing and typesetting

Specialized Tools

  • tidyverse: Data wrangling and analysis in R
  • ggplot2: Advanced data visualization
  • RevealJS: Interactive presentations
  • Git/GitHub: Version control and collaboration

📈 Key Learning Outcomes

📊 Quantitative Analysis - Statistical modeling and hypothesis testing - Econometric techniques and interpretation - Data visualization and communication

💡 Economic Thinking - Microeconomic and macroeconomic theory - Policy analysis and evaluation - Market analysis and business strategy

🔬 Research Skills - Literature review and synthesis - Methodology design and implementation - Academic writing and presentation

💻 Technical Skills - Programming in R and Python - Database management and analysis - Web development and publishing

🚀 Featured Projects

🌡️ Climate Data Analysis

Global Temperature Trends Study

A comprehensive analysis of global temperature data using advanced R programming and statistical techniques. Features interactive visualizations and trend analysis.

Technologies: R, ggplot2, tidyverse, Quarto
Skills: Time series analysis, data visualization, statistical modeling

Mathematical Economics Applications

Advanced mathematical modeling techniques applied to economic problems, featuring optimization, calculus applications, and theoretical analysis.

Technologies: R, LaTeX, Mathematical Modeling
